BANNER.TITLE: The fractional ownership platform for income-generating real estate.
BANNER.DESC: Whether you're targeting residential or commercial properties, we offer a wide range of options that align with your goals. Join now and take advantage of exclusive offers to achieve the highest returns on your investments.

SIGN_IN.TITLE: Sign In
SIGN_IN.SUB_TITLE: Welcome back! Sign in to continue

SIGN_UP.TITLE: Sign Up
SIGN_UP.SUB_TITLE: Create your account to start your investment journey. Fill in the information below to register a new account.
SIGN_UP.PRIMARY_INCOME: What is your primary source of income?
SIGN_UP.PRIMARY_AMOUNT: What is your primary income amount?

FEEDBACK.FEEDBACK_1: Must contain at least one uppercase letter.
FEEDBACK.FEEDBACK_2: Must contain at least one lowercase letter.
FEEDBACK.FEEDBACK_3: Must contain at least one number.
FEEDBACK.FEEDBACK_4: Must contain at least one special character.
FEEDBACK.FEEDBACK_5: Must be at least 8 characters long.
